010package imagingbook.common.image.interpolation;
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
012
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * A {@link PixelInterpolator} implementing nearest-neighbor interpolation in 2D.
017 * See Sec. 22.5.1 of [1] for additional details.
018 * </p>
019 * <p>
020 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
021 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
022 * </p>
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 *
026 */
027public class NearestNeighborInterpolator implements PixelInterpolator {
028        
029        /**
030         * Constructor.
031         */
032        public NearestNeighborInterpolator() {
033        }
034        
035        @Override
036        public float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y) {
037                final int u = (int) Math.rint(x);
038                final int v = (int) Math.rint(y);
039                return ia.getVal(u, v);
040        }
041
042        /**
043         * Corresponds to function w_nn(x), see Eqn. 22.10 in [1].
044         * TODO: test, not used currently.
045         */
046        @Override
047        public double getWeight(double x) {
048                if (-0.5 <= x && x < 0.5)
049                        return 1;
050                else
051                        return 0;
052        }
053        
054}
